argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mopni.1 | |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_mopntop | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> J e. Top ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X /\ R e. RR+ ) -> J e. Top ) |
| 4 |  | #P_rpxr | |- ( R e. RR+ -> R e. RR* ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_blopn | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X /\ R e. RR* ) -> ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) e. J ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl3an3 | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X /\ R e. RR+ ) -> ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) e. J ) |
| 7 |  | #P_blcntr | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X /\ R e. RR+ ) -> P e. ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_opnneip | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) e. J /\ P e. ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) ) -> ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) e. ( ( nei ` J ) ` { P } ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 6, 7, 8 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X /\ R e. RR+ ) -> ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) e. ( ( nei ` J ) ` { P } ) ) |
